page.title: 14ASDA SUPERSTORE IN TOTTON
page.content: The Asda Superstore in Totton was opened in July 1983 by the chairman of the company and the youngest employee a sixteen year old girl from Totton College. The manager is Mr.F.Marra.The store employs 300_320 people.There is a national contest between retail companies and a much smaller one locally. The store was built in Totton because of the recent expansion such as the housing developments and the Totton Western By_Pass.The store covers a large area of central Totton and many houses were demolished to make way for it. The store is a help to the community because it brings trade to the smaller stores.The best selling item is Mother's Pride Sliced loaf,the worst was Remington's Pop_Corn maker.
